message: I propose dividing the money 3:2 in favor of Alice. This ensures a fair distribution considering the decreasing value of money in subsequent rounds.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. This is a fair compromise considering the diminishing value of the money, especially for you.
I propose an equal division of the remaining funds, recognizing the equal impact of inflation on both our financial positions. This aims for fairness and mutual benefit.
